info.name: God Gauntlet
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0. The following graphics are from https://game-icons.net and are used under CC BY 3.0:
* Horse Head: https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/horse-head.html
* Spartan Helmet: https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/spartan-helmet.html
* Tron Arrow https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/tron-arrow.html
* Card Exchange https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/card-exchange.html
* Return Arrow https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/return-arrow.html
* Bolt Shield https://game-icons.net/1x1/lorc/bolt-shield.html
* Move https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/move.html

The following graphics are from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license:
* Color Circle: https://www.freepik.com/icon/circle_12782652
* Poseidon: https://www.freepik.com/icon/poseidon_6025215
* Aphrodite: https://www.freepik.com/icon/aphrodite_6025557 * Hermes: https://www.freepik.com/icon/hermes_6025485 * Zeus: https://www.freepik.com/icon/zeus_6025205 * Hera: https://www.freepik.com/icon/hera_6025521
info.description: Fight for the favor of the gods on a rapidly changing battlefield!

fields.text: You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?

gameStartRoutine.notes: Create collection of starting red tiles on board

loopRoutine.notes: Deal unique tiles to the red starter locations

gameStartRoutine.notes: Move the rest of the red tiles to the main red deck
Create collection of starting blue tiles on board

loopRoutine.notes: Deal unique tiles to the blue starter locations

gameStartRoutine.notes: Move the rest of the blue tiles to the main blue deck

gameStartRoutine.note: Deal each player a hand of cards
Deal each player a hand of cards

loopRoutine.notes: Deal positive tokens to the bench

gameStartRoutine.notes: Move the rest of the positive tokens to the temp holder
Move the negative tokens to the temp holder as well

loopRoutine.notes: Deal the now-combined positive and negative tokens to the board
